GSD.description:
video: fbdev: nvidiafb: Use strscpy() to prevent buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 47e5533adf118afaf06d25a3e2aaaab89371b1c5. For more details please see the references link.
